Install
```````


.. code:: bash

    `[sudo] pip install cp`

Usage
`````


.. code:: python

    >>> from cp import cp
    
    >>> cp(src,dst)


Examples
````````


.. code:: python

    >>> cp(src,dst)
    >>> cp(src,dst) # skip, exists
    >>> cp(src,dst,force=True) # force cp
